TopicTitle: I am looking for a set of Floodlights

Articles.Content:
Hello,

 

I once used a set of floodlights. I miss them now.

They have been a set of three parts.

  • one single floodlight
  • a set of 2x2 floodlights
  • a set od 3x4 floodlights (I don't remember this exactly)

Does anybody remember this set too and may give me a hint or a link. That would be very nice.

 

Thanks,

- Isabelle
B9 Aerospace has some lights like this if IIRC

Terrific!

 

That is it.
Thank you so much!
Yes, they are in B9, but the problem is the mod pack is SO large it really is un-fun...

4 minutes ago, adsii1970 said:

Yes, they are in B9, but the problem is the mod pack is SO large it really is un-fun...

 

So install it, then install Janitor's Closet which you can use to hide/prune the unwanted parts

@adsii1970 ... OR you could just extract ONLY the two Utility_Light folders from B9 instead of adding any other mods...

Also, Fengist's Maritime (or maybe it was the Submarine Pack), have quite a few awesome floodlights... I use them in every one of my KSP installs, by themselves...
Same thing, just extract only the folders for the lights... no need to install the whole mod, OR any of the dependencies
